channel.title: I have made a forum 2 help players create servers
channel.description:
Well, i have made a forum to help players create their servers, it has tuts codes and guides.. 0wn3r ben has added a chat box and many other things! he has made the forum neater and more organised. i do need other players 2 begin in helping and also, we need members so sign up and you may post and ask for guides that have not been posted and add guides for others! the more you help other players the more likely you will get forum moderator. AND i almost forgot to tell you what the forum was
forum - giggzserverhelp.smfforfree4.com forum - giggzserverhelp.smfforfree4.com forum - giggzserverhelp.smfforfree4.com forum - giggzserverhelp.smfforfree4.com[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 23, 2008, 03:44:44 pm[/size][hr]Lol, sorry forgot i already posted it.. bad memory :(
